service_figures: INT. has over 26 years of experience in delivering software engineering solutions, with a portfolio of more than 500 clients and over 11,000 client projects. The company operates across multiple countries including India, the UK, the USA, Canada, and Singapore. INT. has been recognized for its triple-digit revenue growth over three years and has received numerous awards for its innovative IT products and digital transformation services. The company emphasizes its commitment to delivering timely and effective solutions, as evidenced by its rapid development of the MyGov platform within three months to address urgent citizen engagement needs.
